cells.data: -- foldr1May :: (a -> a -> a) -> [a] -> Maybe aon foldr1May(f, xs)	set lng to length of xs	if lng > 0 then		tell mReturn(f)			set v to item -1 of xs			repeat with i from lng - 1 to 1 by -1				set v to |Î»|(item i of xs, v, i, xs)			end repeat			return Just(v)		end tell	else		Nothing()	end ifend foldr1May
